snippet: The first general manager of the Meadowlands Racetrack, the trainer-driver Dick Stillings and five horses are to be inducted into the Harness Racing Hall of Fame on Sunday.
abstract: Bob Quigley, first general manager of Meadowlands Racetrack, trainer-driver Dick Stillings and five horses are to be inducted into the Harness Racing Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: The first general manager of the Meadowlands Racetrack, the trainer-driver Dick Stillings and five horses are to be inducted into the Harness Racing Hall of Fame on Sunday.

headline.main: Meadowlands G.M. Among Those Inducted Into Harness Racing Hall
